text: Aey eman walo! Tum Allah kay samney sachi khalis tauba kero. Qareeb hai kay tumhara rab tumharay gunah door kerday aur tumhen aisi jannaton mein dakhil keray jin kay neechay nehren jari hain. Jiss din Allah Taalaa nabi ko aur eman daron ko jo inn kay sath hain ruswa na keray ga. Inn ka noor inn kay samney aur inn kay dayen dor raha hoga. Yeh duayen kertay hongay aey humaray rab humen kaamil noor ata farma aur humen bakhsh dey yaqeenan tu her cheez per qadir hai
